ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, one of my guildmates suggested this so I tried it.  I logged back in the next day and found myself in a canoe in the middle of the ocean no where near
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, one of my guildmates suggested this so I tried it. I logged back in
the next day and found myself in a canoe in the middle of the ocean no where
near land. Maybe I switched places with some other explorer? It seems to
depend on what has happened to the canoe you camped in in the meantime. If
it hasn't despawned you definitely reappear in the canoe wherever it is
currently. Otherwise it may be the sister isle, unless my canoe had been
used continuously for 14 hours, which sadly enough is actually a
possibility.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 1:52 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug


Speaking of OOT, I found a very useful bug there a while back with my Monk.
I was in a canoe and had gotten lost trying to find the sisters isle to get
on the boat. So I got bored and camped while in the canoe. Well I logged
back on about an hour later to find myself on the dock at the sister's isle.
I have not tried to reproduce it though.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 12:44 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug
>
>
> Hail a Lurker! Hey Rylos! I have had some zoning issues as
> well, both in
> Lavastorm and OOT. I zoned into OOT from Butcherblock, only
> to find myself
> on the sister isle. This has happened a couple of times and
> is a real pain
> as the Freeport bound boat no longer stops there. I have
> also zoned in and
> found myself on the bottom of the world. There was no escape
> from this
> situation, so I had to wait for a guide to show up.
>
> Lavastorm hasn't dropped me in Lava yet, but I have zoned
> from Najena into
> OOT. That was truly bizarre, especially since I was actually
> headed to
> Butcherblock. I've also zoned out of Najena and appeared in
> Najena near the
> Tentacle Terror room. Very odd.
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tieben, David P [mailto:david_tieben@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 1:41 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug
>
>
> I have found Lavastorm to be very buggy when zoning in and
> out of it. I
> have zoned out of Najena into a pool of lava. The guide
> didn't bat an eye
> about rezzing me so I figured it must happen quite often. I
> also had an odd
> occurance happen last night. I was zoning from Nektulos and
> had a couple
> guards on me. and while zoning was disconnected several
> times. When I
> finally got back in I was in the NE corner of the zone rather
> than by the
> zone line. I have only had this happen when zoning from
> Oasis and dropping
> in near the grassy section of N Ro.
>
> Rylos Darmadrigal Bard of the 21st (almost 22nd) chorus on E'ci
>
>
